title: Mana Flows
effect: Add xxSORCERY die to each eldritch location.

title: Snow Flurries
effect: All characters in wilderness locations take 1xxBODY.

title: Brutal Cold
effect: All characters in wilderness or rural locations take 2xxBODY.

title: Blizzard
effect: Discard all units in xxREDBANK. All characters in wilderness or rural locations take 3xxBODY.

title: Trade Fair
effect: Add xxTECHNOLOGY die to each urban location.

title: Flooding
effect: Do no refresh the xxDIPLOMACY pool this turn.

title: Traveling Weather
effect: Each player may immediately move one of their characters to a different location.

title: Heat Wave
effect: All characters in urban locations take 2xxBODY.

title: Drought
effect: Do not refresh the xxSTABILITY pool this turn.

title: Bountiful Harvest
effect: Add xxSTABILITY die to each location in xxREDBANK.

title: Mana Backlash
effect: Discard all foes in xxREDBANK. All characters in eldritch locations take 3xxPSYCHE.
